Updates the wallet payment quantity with the parameters specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  parameters={undefined}
>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"quantity":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","nullable":true},"description":"The mapping of item identifiers with their respective quantities in the payment.","nullable":true,"example":[{"key":"some text","value":1234}]},"productQuantityType":{"enum":[0,1,2,3],"type":"integer","format":"int32","title":"ProductQuantityType"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for the wallet payment quantity specifications.","title":"WalletQuantityRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
